channel.title: Help me with my weapon configuration?
channel.description:
[URL=http://tinypic.com/r/4qhd1u/5]View My Video[/URL] [b]WATCH THIS FIRST[/b]
1.) How do I get my weapons to actually strike instead of disapearing and looking like some homo trying to slap someone.
2.) How do I make it so that my custom weapons actually take up both hands, I have already put the id number in item.java under twohanded and it still didn't work.
3.) How do I get my wings to fly once I equip them.
This is a 317 private server
